derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French (see sur-, loin)

entry.def: A sirloin is a piece of beef which is cut from the bottom and side parts of a cow's back.

means.word_mean: 1. the portion of the loin (especially of beef) just in front of the rump
